relatedBlades.title: Trust-focused technologies
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare products help organizations keep end-user data private and secure.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare offers a wide variety of security and networking services. Learn about our products that are especially relevant to protecting user data from unauthorized access, managing user access, navigating data localization, and more.

relatedBlades.title: Data localization suite
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's Data Localization Suite offers the security and performance benefits of our global network  while making it easy to control which locations traffic is inspected in, and to decide where logs are sent.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Set rules and controls at the edge about where data is stored and protected.

relatedBlades.title: Encryption
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's network can encrypt data everywhere on its journey from origin servers to end-users. Use our rich customization options for certificate management, TLS version control, and encryption key storage.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Boost data privacy and security with advanced protocols and tools.

image.description: Illustration of a shield, lock, and password

relatedBlades.title: Access management
relatedBlades.copy: The Cloudflare network enables Zero Trust application and Internet access from any device, anywhere. Authenticate users from the network edge, log access events and data requests to internal applications, and block risky sites.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Monitor data access and reduce the risk of breaches.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a computer connecting to remote resources

relatedBlades.title: Application security
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's many application security services can protect web applications from injection attacks, cross-site scripting, API abuse, and other attempts to access sensitive user data.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Keep attackers out of your web application's database.

image.description: Image for the API Shield blade

relatedBlades.title: Web analytics
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's Web Analytics does not use any client-side state, such as cookies or localStorage, to collect usage metrics  and never 'fingerprints' individual users.
relatedBlades.subheadline: Lightweight, accurate analytics with no privacy trade-offs.

image.description: Illustration of charts and graphs with a padlock icon

imageAssetFile.altText: Various charts show the usefulness of analytics.
imageAssetFile.title: analytics-privacy-hero

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of charts and graphs with a padlock icon

relatedBlades.quote: As an insurance broker we have to prove that we take adequate precautions to prevent unauthorized access to our data. By allowing Cloudflare as the single user of our private cloud, we've eliminated entire classes of threat vectors and made our security that much simpler to prove.

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
